intro: Aneilema recurvatum, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Araceae family, which includes plants like芋头 and peace lilies. The plant is characterized by its distinctive zigzagging stems and heart-shaped leaves. It produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically surrounded by a spadix, a common feature in the Araceae family. Aneilema recurvatum is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and ability to thrive in shaded environments.
